29.heading: Vandercave, Cliff.
29.title: The Flintstones [videorecording]
29.author: a Hanna-Barbera/Amblin Entertainment production ; Universal City Studios, Inc.
notes: Cast: John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Elizabeth Perkins, Rosie O'Donnell, Kyle MacLachlan, Halle Berry, Elizabeth Taylor.

Writers, Tom S. Parker, Jim Jennewein, Steven E. de Souza ; producer, Bruce Cohen ; director, Brian Levant ; music, David Newman ; executive producers, William Hanna, Joseph Barbera, Kathleen Kennedy, David Kirschner, Gerald R. Molen.

Summary (from OCLC cataloging): Cliff Vandercave & his accomplice plan a robbery but they need a stooge (Fred Flintstone) to take the rap. A sudden promotion (part of their scheme) puts Fred in the executive suite, while Barney's luck takes a turn for the worse.
